조리순서: [{'step_number': 1, 'description': '김치를먹기좋게자른다', 'image_url': 'https://recipe1.ezmember.co.kr/cache/recipe/2019/01/13/6221901ac4c0ac282c3af7b06fe626401.jpg'}, {'step_number': 2, 'description': '양파를자른다', 'image_url': 'https://recipe1.ezmember.co.kr/cache/recipe/2019/01/13/a6719096ba879d31d258557667919dab1.jpg'}, {'step_number': 3, 'description': '김치국물과 국간장,맛술,다진마늘을 넣고 볶아준다', 'image_url': 'https://recipe1.ezmember.co.kr/cache/recipe/2019/01/13/1c2af01f2cd223bf27ff86ffbc18b1101.jpg'}, {'step_number': 4, 'description': '돈까스를 튀겨준다', 'image_url': 'https://recipe1.ezmember.co.kr/cache/recipe/2019/01/13/ff90799994062b73a926fe0612a09def1.jpg'}, {'step_number': 5, 'description': '튀긴돈까스를 김치양념에 넣고 조리한다', 'image_url': 'https://recipe1.ezmember.co.kr/cache/recipe/2019/01/13/721fbf06b7b22ef9b0d4456bc91d89f81.jpg'}, {'step_number': 6, 'description': '계란1개를 풀어준다', 'image_url': 'https://recipe1.ezmember.co.kr/cache/recipe/2019/01/13/ca02dda5ea99a8dfbb7ccf9444442a431.jpg'}, {'step_number': 7, 'description': '대파와 치즈를 넣고 뚜껑을 닫아주면 끝', 'image_url': 'https://recipe1.ezmember.co.kr/cache/recipe/2019/01/13/2bd57632700a58b4b9e4b07f2192883c1.jpg'}]
